title: Python Programming
text: Python is a high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It's widely used in web development, data science, machine learning, and AI applications.

title: Machine Learning
text: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn and make decisions from data without being explicitly programmed. It includes supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning.

title: Docker
text: Docker is a containerization platform that allows you to package applications and their dependencies into lightweight, portable containers. It ensures consistency across different environments.

title: Vector Databases
text: Vector databases are specialized databases designed to store and query high-dimensional vectors efficiently. They're essential for RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems and semantic search.

title: Ollama
text: Ollama is a tool that makes it easy to run large language models locally on your machine. It supports many open-source models and provides a simple API for integration.
